props.description: Studying and honing his skills across the spectrum of technical understanding and product development - his transferable experience spans a diverse range of stages and cultures;
props.additional: He also rarely speaks in third person (promise).

data.title: Designer
data.description: Completing 400 hours of hands-on UX training & working as a UX consultant provides the skills to discover, understand and empathise with user problems - then dream up & test the best solutions to solve them.

data.title: Developer
data.description: Development brings it all together - building solutions with quality, usability and the customer top of mind. I've built my own startup, completed hundreds of hours of practical engineering training, and gained experience across the full-stack.

data.title: Deliverer
data.description: 4 years in Product Management means I understand business requirements to scope, prioritise and deliver ideas. I've led a team of 10 engineers to deliver apps with 4.5+ star ratings and know how to work in a high-performing Product team.

data.title: Debugger
data.description: A decade in IT Consulting & Sysadmin provides an underlying ability to approach and solve complex technical problems in logical steps. This deep understanding of technology helps me adopt the best tools for a given task & produce scalable solutions.
